sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO DIVISIONS (DIVISION_ID , DIVISION_NAME, UPDATED_BY) VALUES (#divisionId#, #divisionName#, #updateBy#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE DIVISIONS SET DIVISION_NAME = #divisionName#, UPDATED_BY = #updateBy# WHERE DIVISION_ID=#divisionId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DIVISION_ID AS divisionId, DIVISION_NAME AS divisionName FROM DIVISIONS WHERE DIVISION_ID=#id#
